member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions
member.summary: Various extension methods to convert between SkiaSharp types and CoreGraphics types.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToCGColor(SkiaSharp.SKColor)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp color into a CoreGraphics color.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToCGImage(SkiaSharp.SKBitmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp bitmap into a CoreGraphics image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the bitmap data as a CoreGraphics image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToCGImage(SkiaSharp.SKImage)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp image into a CoreGraphics image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a CoreGraphics image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToCGImage(SkiaSharp.SKPixmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp pixmap into a CoreGraphics image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the pixel data as a CoreGraphics image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToCGImage(SkiaSharp.SKPicture,SkiaSharp.SKSizeI)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp picture into a CoreGraphics image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the picture as a CoreGraphics image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToNSData(SkiaSharp.SKData)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp data object into a NSData.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the data as a NSData.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToPoint(SkiaSharp.SKPoint)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp point into a CoreGraphics point.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToRect(SkiaSharp.SKRect)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp rectangle into a CoreGraphics rectangle.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToSize(SkiaSharp.SKSize)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp size into a CoreGraphics size.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToSKBitmap(CoreGraphics.CGImage)
member.summary: Converts a CoreGraphics image into a SkiaSharp bitmap.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a SkiaSharp bitmap.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToSKColor(CoreGraphics.CGColor)
member.summary: Converts a CoreGraphics color into a SkiaSharp color.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToSKData(Foundation.NSData)
member.summary: Converts a NSData into a SkiaSharp data object.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the data as a SkiaSharp data object.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToSKImage(CoreGraphics.CGImage)
member.summary: Converts a CoreGraphics image into a SkiaSharp image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a SkiaSharp image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToSKPixmap(CoreGraphics.CGImage,SkiaSharp.SKPixmap)
member.param: The SkiaSharp pixmap to hold the copy of the image data.
member.summary: Converts a CoreGraphics image into a SkiaSharp pixmap.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToSKPoint(CoreGraphics.CGPoint)
member.summary: Converts a CoreGraphics point into a SkiaSharp point.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToSKRect(CoreGraphics.CGRect)
member.summary: Converts a CoreGraphics rectangle into a SkiaSharp rectangle.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.AppleExtensions.ToSKSize(CoreGraphics.CGSize)
member.summary: Converts a CoreGraphics size into a SkiaSharp size.

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.iOSExtensions
member.summary: Various extension methods to convert between SkiaSharp types and UIKit types.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.iOSExtensions.ToSKBitmap(UIKit.UIImage)
member.summary: Converts a UIKit image into a SkiaSharp bitmap.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a SkiaSharp bitmap.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.iOSExtensions.ToSKColor(UIKit.UIColor)
member.summary: Converts a UIKit color into a SkiaSharp color.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.iOSExtensions.ToSKImage(UIKit.UIImage)
member.summary: Converts a UIKit image into a SkiaSharp image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a SkiaSharp image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.iOSExtensions.ToSKPixmap(UIKit.UIImage,SkiaSharp.SKPixmap)
member.param: The SkiaSharp pixmap to hold the copy of the image data.
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp pixmap into a UIKit image.
member.returns: Returns if the copy was successful, otherwise .

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.iOSExtensions.ToUIColor(SkiaSharp.SKColor)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp color into a UIKit color.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.iOSExtensions.ToUIImage(SkiaSharp.SKBitmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp bitmap into a UIKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the bitmap data as a UIKit image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.iOSExtensions.ToUIImage(SkiaSharp.SKImage)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp image into a UIKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a UIKit image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.iOSExtensions.ToUIImage(SkiaSharp.SKPixmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp pixmap into a UIKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the pixel data as a UIKit image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.iOSExtensions.ToUIImage(SkiaSharp.SKPicture,SkiaSharp.SKSizeI)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp picture into a UIKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the picture as a UIKit image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.iOSExtensions.ToUIImage(SkiaSharp.SKBitmap,System.nfloat,UIKit.UIImageOrientation)
member.param: The scale factor for the image. A factor of 1.0 is the original size of the image.
The rotation that is to be applied to the image.
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp bitmap into a UIKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the bitmap data as a UIKit image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.iOSExtensions.ToUIImage(SkiaSharp.SKPixmap,System.nfloat,UIKit.UIImageOrientation)
member.param: The scale factor for the image. A factor of 1.0 is the original size of the image.
The rotation that is to be applied to the image.
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp pixmap into a UIKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the pixel data as a UIKit image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.iOSExtensions.ToUIImage(SkiaSharp.SKPicture,SkiaSharp.SKSizeI,System.nfloat,UIKit.UIImageOrientation)
member.param: The scale factor for the image. A factor of 1.0 is the original size of the image.
The rotation that is to be applied to the image.
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp picture into a UIKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the picture as a UIKit image.

member.summary: Provides data for the event.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the event arguments.
